duties_responsibilities.duty: Operating powered industrial trucks (PIT) and performing daily checks on equipment prior to operating.
Following all safety guidelines and reporting faulty equipment, damage to company property, and safety hazards.
Accurately picking/packing orders, restocking picking bins, and sorting, counting, and receiving merchandise.
Moving product to and from pallet racks, working with conveyors, and loading/unloading trucks.
Organizing warehouse storage space effectively and adhering to all safety, quality, and production standards.
Using a scanner to direct work and handling repetitive tasks such as lifting, bending, and standing.
Working effectively in a team environment and demonstrating flexibility in daily task assignments.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED; 1-2 years of experience as a certified equipment operator is ideal; knowledge of RF scanners and basic computer skills are preferred.
